vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐνώπ-ιος, ον,
(ὤψ) facing, to the front, πρό τ᾽ ἐνώπια [Refs 7th c.BC+]face to face, [LXX]; ἄρτοι ἐ. shewbread, [Refs]; διαστολῶν γεγονυιῶν ὑμῖν καὶ ἐνοπίοις (sic) καὶ διὰ γραμμάτων in person, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__II neuter ἐνώπιον as adverb, face to face, [Refs 3rd c.BC+]; in person, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]: as preposition with genitive, [NT+4th c.BC+]. Regul. adverb -ίως[Refs]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 在, 裡, 藉著, 靠 ...
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 在, 里, 借着, 靠 ...

vocabInfos.shortDef: before, in the presence of; in behalf of, by authority of
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
before, in the presence of; in behalf of, by authority of
gen., before, in the presence of, Lk. 5:25; 8:47; in front of, Rev. 4:5, 6; immediately preceding as a forerunner, Lk. 1:17; Rev. 16:19; from the Hebrew, in the presence of, metaphysically, i.e. in the sphere of sensation or thought, Lk. 12:9; 15:10; Acts 10:31; in the eyes of, in the judgment of, Lk. 16:15; 24:11; Acts 4:19
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ante, en la presencia de, en frente de ; en el juicio de, entre ; pecar en contra (LUC.15:18,21)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 在 (某人或某物) 的前面
2) 在...眼中, 在....眼前, 在...之中
3) 根據.....的意見或判斷
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 在(某人或某物) 的前面
2) 在...眼中, 在....眼前, 在...之中
3) 根据.....的意见或判断
